title: Perceptions of patients and their relatives about schadenfreude towards doctors
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Fatih Yıldırım, Zeynep Çakır, Sefa Özdemir, İnci Yılmazlı Trout, Atıf Bayramoğlu, Oğuzhan Ekinci, Serap Atasever Belli, İkram Yusuf Yarbaşı, Muhammet Mutlu, Rıdvan Akın, Burcu Yaşar, Seda Kayapalı Yıldırım, Ezgi Kaşdarma, Begüm Yılmazcan
